__e: They believe you're the moon god's slave, with your three eyes.
Now he's just like the rest of 'em, a slave to his old man, a good-for-nothing coward.
And I may be the Patsy of the group, but at least I'm in the group, right?
I serve the King, that is all I'm guilty of!
What am I, your valet service?
But you are his servant, his trustworthy assistant!
Look, you might not need me, but you damn sure need him!
I'm that service. You know? I perform it, and I perform it well.
My point is I'm no good to you dead or in jail.
Now you're the main part of our part, so what does he need me for?
Anyway, you don't need me standing up there looking like a jerk.
He said everything has a purpose, but what would I be good for?
WELL... IF YOU DON'T NEED ME FOR ANYTHING ELSE, DO YOU MIND IF I TAKE OFF?
But I still don't understand why you need me on this case.
But you won't, 'cause you need me for somethin'.
I'm the servant of God. I speak with his voice.
I am God's servant on this earth, not you!
What I know, what I can't get right with is a man of God giving away a wee baby!
You hold the door for a guy who pays you so little you got to moonlight in a bar.
I know you need me, but I truly believe that right now, I'm needed more here.
What I know, what I can't get right with is a man of God giving away a wee baby!
